snp5.1:14.4: Jinānaṃ hettha → jinānaṃ hettha (bj); jinānaṃ heta (si); jinānaṃ heta (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
snp5.1:15.2: pathavimaṇḍale → puthuvi maṇḍale (bj); puthavimaṇḍale (bj, pts-vp-pli1); paṭhavimaṇḍale (sya-all)
snp5.1:20.5: gantvāna passemu → gantvā namassemu (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
snp5.1:25.3: Dvattiṃsāni ca → dvattiṃsā ca (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); dvattiṃsa tāni (?)
snp5.1:36.2: Purimāhissatiṃ → purimaṃ māhissatiṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); puraṃ māhissatiṃ (sya-all)
snp5.1:41.2: Sataraṃsiṃva → vītaraṃsiṃva (si, sya-all); vītaraṃsiva (pts-vp-pli1); sataraṃsīva (mr); pītaraṃsiṃva (^cnd1#42 [Vatthugāthā])
